topic.title: Programming Light Bulbs to a Lighting Group
topic.shortdesc: You can program one or more light bulbs to a lighting group to operate that group with your remote control.

section.p: Your remote control can manage up to 250 network light bulbs on the same lighting network. When you add a light bulb to the network, you can program it to one or more lighting groups.
You must assign a light bulb to at least one lighting group to operate that light bulb.

li.p: Remove any existing light bulb from the light fixture.
Install the network light bulb into the light fixture as you would any standard light bulb.
Turn power to the light fixture on.
